Manager Class

Defined in: src/manager.js:5

A freedom port which manages the control plane of of changing hub routes.

(
  • hub
  • resource
  • api
)

  • resource Resource

    The resource manager for the runtime.

  • api Api

    The API manager for the runtime.

createLink

(
  • port
  • name
  • destination
  • [destName]
  • [toDest]
)

Defined in src/manager.js:207

Create a link between two ports. Links are created in both directions, and a message with those capabilities is sent to the source port.

Parameters:

  • port Port

    The source port.

  • name String

    The flow for messages from destination to port.

  • destination Port

    The destination port.

  • [destName] String optional

    The flow name for messages to the destination.

  • [toDest] Boolean optional

    Tell the destination about the link.

onMessage

(
  • flow
  • message
)

Defined in src/manager.js:48

Process messages sent to this port. The manager, or 'control' destination handles several types of messages, identified by the request property. The actions are:

  1. debug. Prints the message to the console.
  2. link. Creates a link between the source and a provided destination port.
  3. environment. Instantiate a module environment defined in ModuleInternal.
  4. delegate. Routes a defined set of control messages to another location.
  5. resource. Registers the source as a resource resolver.
  6. core. Generates a core provider for the requester.
  7. close. Tears down routes involing the requesting port.
  8. unlink. Tears down a route from the requesting port.

Parameters:

  • flow String

    The source identifier of the message.

  • message Object

    The received message.

removeLink

(
  • port
  • name
)

Defined in src/manager.js:267

Remove a link between to ports. The reverse link will also be removed.

Parameters:

  • port Port

    The source port.

  • name String

    The flow to be removed.
